alert.note: Alert for Boone; Lincoln (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 1:27PM EDT until June 17 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: The National Weather Service in Charleston West Virginia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Lincoln County in central West Virginia... Northwestern Boone County in central West Virginia... * Until 200 PM EDT. * At 126 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Ranger, or 10 miles south of Hamlin, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Madison, Ranger, Gill, Spurlockville, Harts, Julian, Alum Creek, Danville, Turtle Creek, Woodville, Palermo, Alkol and Mud. This includes Route 119 between mile markers 46 and 64. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
